resources.string: \ Epic Tic Tac Toe is an expansion on the classic tic tac toe game. Nine tic tac toe boards are arranged in a 3x3 grid. The first player can move anywhere; however, all subsequent moves are placed in the empty spaces on the board corresponding to the square of the previous move (for example, if a player placed a mark on the upper-right square of a board, the next player would place a mark somewhere within the upper-right board). \n If a player cannot move because the indicated board is full, the next move may go on any board. \n When a player gets 3 in a row on one board, that board is marked and cannot be won by the other player. Victory is achieved when these marks make a 3 in a row on the giant 3x3 grid.
